message: Let's split it 50/50, it's a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll still give you a decent amount. Next round, I'll be in a weaker position!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of again!
You're not getting a good deal here, but I'm willing to compromise. Don't expect me to give you more than this!
I'm not going to give in yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect it to get any better!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm not going to accept such a small share. I want a bigger piece of the pie!
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting impatient. This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to accept this tiny share. I want nothing, and you can have it all!
